data.title: User:BigDocFan/Japanese Cast lists Johto
data.text:
Thanks to PaperSplash translating the end credits for me and providing a link to which episodes had the end credits translated. I've decided to split the Johto episodes up, leaving the Kanto and Orange Islands in the previous thread.
